alternative_parents.description: Organic neutral compounds having formal unit electrical charges of opposite sign.
alternative_parents.name: Organic zwitterions

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds consisting of an assembly of cations and anions.
alternative_parents.name: Organic salts

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organometallic compounds containing an alkyl group attached to a mercury atom.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl mercury compounds

class.description: Organometallic compounds hat containing a metal atom substituted by on or more alkyl groups.
class.name: Metal alkyls

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as transition metal alkyls. These are metal alkyls, where the alkyl group is attached to a transition metal atom.

direct_parent.description: Metal alkyls, where the alkyl group is attached to a transition metal atom.
direct_parent.name: Transition metal alkyls

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Metal alkyls, where the alkyl group is attached to a transition metal atom.
subclass.name: Transition metal alkyls

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and metal atom.
superclass.name: Organometallic compounds
